Title: P-3 BOMB BAY
description: Roll 2D per shell hit on Bomb Bay

2.description: Bomb explodes in bomb bay - B-17 and crew destroyed

3.description: Roll 1D: 1-5 = bomb damaged but does not explode; 6 = bomb explodes, B-17 and crew destroyed

sub_roll.1-5: Bomb damaged but does not explode
sub_roll.6: Bomb explodes - B-17 and crew destroyed

4.description: Rubber rafts damaged - landing in water roll -6

6.description: Bomb bay doors inoperable - must jettison bombs or abort mission
notes: Mission may be aborted - see rules section Aborting the Mission

9.description: Bomb release mechanism inoperable - bombs cannot be dropped normally

10.description: Norden bombsight inoperable - Bomb Run automatically off target
notes: Bomb Run automatically off target regardless of Table O-6 roll

12.description: Ball turret mechanism inoperable - gunner trapped
notes: Gunner trapped in turret, may not fire guns, may not bailout
If landing gear inoperable, gunner automatically KIA on landing

condition_effects.bombs_aboard: Results 2 and 3 only apply if bombs are still aboard
condition_effects.no_bombs: If no bombs aboard, treat results 2 and 3 as Superficial Damage

notes: Results 2 and 3 only apply if bombs are still aboard the aircraft
Rubber raft damage affects water landing survival
See rules section Aborting the Mission for bomb bay door damage
